# Privacy Policy {.page-title}

Last updated: December 3, 2025
:::

## Overview

This Research Hub website is a personal academic project website. We do not collect, store, or process any personal information from visitors.

## Information We Don't Collect

- We do not use cookies
- We do not track visitors
- We do not collect email addresses or contact information
- We do not use analytics services

## External Links

This website contains links to external resources including:

- Google Drive
- Google Docs
- GitHub repositories
- Quarto publishing platform

These external services have their own privacy policies. We recommend reviewing their policies if you choose to visit those sites.

## Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

## Contact

If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact:

Email: maowens@stanford.edu
